bibl.title: A Brief Report on the Excavations at Ismant el-Kharab in 1992-93.
bibl.note: The Inner Temenos of the Main Temple of Tutu. - Enclosure 4. - Area A, House 4 (35 fragments from inscribed wooden boards, 87 papyrus deposits, 14 ostraka and 123 coins were recovered). - The coinage.
bibl.seg: BOWEN Gillian E., Colin A. HOPE and Olaf E. KAPER, A Brief Report on the Excavations at Ismant el-Kharab in 1992-93.

The Inner Temenos of the Main Temple of Tutu. - Enclosure 4. - Area A, House 4 (35 fragments from inscribed wooden boards, 87 papyrus deposits, 14 ostraka and 123 coins were recovered). - The coinage.
